Title: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS Picture Drama
Description: ['A picture drama released on the BD Box Set of ', Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS, '. Subaru, Teana, Vivio host a radio show promoting their own BD Box Sets. They look at a hypothetical Midchilda Academy with all the core cast is present be it as students or as teachers.']
